title: Holiday Detox: The Mean Green Smoothie.
directions: Place the the ingredients, except for the hemp seeds, in a high powdered blender and blend until smooth and creamy. If you like your smoothies thin, add orange juice or coconut milk. Pour into a glass and sprinkle with hemp seeds. Enjoy
ingredients: 1/2 cup fresh or frozen pineapple chunks
3/4 cup orange juice, preferably freshly squeezed
